msg: Update PlainTextSerializer to serialize text object model elements instead of strings.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Eliminate getX() and getY() methods from Mouse class; move corresponding functionality to Display/DisplayHost getMouseLocation() method. This is more reliable and fixes a bug in displaying tooltips.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add preliminary support for WTK text object model.
